column5: Fully furnished, safe, clean home in well established area: 9 ft year-round maintained diving pool, fireplace, large master bdrm with 2 premium queen beds, 1 bath, 2 dens, 3 large screen HD TV's, fully-equipped galley kitchen, breakfast nook, office, and washer/dryer. All amenities provided. Free WiFi, Amazon, Hulu, Netflix. Close to DFW Airport, Arlington entertainment district (Cowboys and Ranger stadium), Six Flags, Verizon Theatre, and UTA. Quick access to Downtown Dallas or Fort Worth.
column8: DFW Mid-cities Ranch style 2 dens, fireplace, pool
